info.author: GaÃ«l Le Mignot
info.description:
Cockpit is a Saas (Software as a Service) solution for managing e-mailing and newsletters. With no necessary setup, this 100% online application program allows you to manage your contacts:

    * A tag system helps you to dynamically manage your different categories 
    * Statistics give you informative feedback on sent newsletters
    * Account management tools help you keep track of subscriptions and unsubscriptions, e-mail opening and errors

Pilot Systems commercialize Cockpit, as a `SaaS
<http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/SaaS>`_  program. Pilot Systems decided on the occasion of `Open World Forum 
<http://www.openworldforum.org/ 2010>`_ , to publish under an `GNU AGPL  
<http://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0.html>`_ licence.
This version contains the whole code of the application, except for our script that are specific for our servers.

Cockpit combines the simplicity of an online use and the power of a contact management software. When connected to Cockpit, you can access all main functionnalities through simple icons. Furthermore, Cockpit displays and keeps track of all changes made. Whether it is a new contact, a modification of an old one or a newsletter, you are aware of all the current activity your Cockpit system allows you to do. Wether it is a new contact, modification of an old one or a newletters post, you are instantly aware of all activity happening on your Cockpit system.

Cockpit is a Saas (Software as a Service) solution for managing e-mailing and newsletters. With no necessary setup, this 100% online application program allows you to manage your contacts:

  • Statistics give you informative feedback on sent newsletters

Pilot Systems commercialize Cockpit, as a SaaS program. Pilot Systems decided on the occasion of Open World Forum , to publish under an GNU AGPL licence. This version contains the whole code of the application, except for our script that are specific for our servers.

Cockpit combines the simplicity of an online use and the power of a contact management software. When connected to Cockpit, you can access all main functionnalities through simple icons. Furthermore, Cockpit displays and keeps track of all changes made. Whether it is a new contact, a modification of an old one or a newsletter, you are aware of all the current activity your Cockpit system allows you to do.
